data.title: Kwame Brown goes off on Gilbert Arenas: 'What gives a gun-toting dumb son of a b*tch the credibility to talk about anybody?'
data.meta_description: LakeShowYo: Kwame Brown WENT OFF on Gilbert Arenas 😳
data.text:
LakeShowYo: Kwame Brown WENT OFF on Gilbert Arenas 😳 “What gives a gun-toting dumb son of a b*tch the credibility to talk about anybody?” 😭😭

Source: Twitter

More on this storyline

ClutchPoints: Gilbert Arenas: “Isiah [Thomas] lost, [Michael] Jordan, as a friend to [him], was like, ‘I want the same respect’ & the fact that Isiah walked off [He] took it personally.” Shannon Sharpe: “[He] should have been on the Dream Team.” (via @NightcapShow_) pic.twitter.com/9sWdbDEvzh -via Twitter @ClutchPointsApp / March 20, 2024

NBA Central: Gilbert Arenas says LeBron James doesn’t deserve a statue with the Lakers “He don’t have enough accolades in the Laker uniform.” (Via @NightcapShow_ / h/t @ClutchPoints ) pic.twitter.com/OLASCDfUpq -via Twitter @TheNBACentral / March 4, 2024

Former three-time NBA All-Star Gilbert Arenas has a plan on how to make the NBA game more balanced on both sides of the floor and address the lack of defensive intensity. “Get rid of all Europeans,” Arenas said during the most recent episode of his Gil’s Arena show. The quote was initially met with laughs by his guests, including former NBA All-Star Kenyon Martin who almost spilled his coffee. -via EuroHoops.net / March 3, 2024
